title: Inmou
synopsis: After being childhood friends for many years, she sees more in him than just a friend. She wants a more intimate relationship... It just so happens her parents won't be home and she convinces him to come over.
staff: [['Kuramori, Rokurou', ['Director']], ['Horikawa, Kazuto', ['Editing', ' Director of Photography']], ['Tanishi', ['Original Creator']]]
